Subject: INVOICE MANAGEMENT

Hi Kate,

I am just trying to make sure we keep track of all payments and have all associated invoices. It is rather confusing when the billing doesn't match the quotes signed off.
For example the original painting quote that we signed off on included the floor sanding, but on the invoices, the painting is separate and the floor sanding has come in today on the outstanding gardening quote which is now paid. I can't find an actual invoice for the amount paid by Jo for the first 50% of the painting, can you please send this through. Also, I paid on Amex $5234.05 on the 20th September but can't find the corresponding paperwork for that amount or invoice, can you also please send that through.
